description: Two peacocks facing a tree.  Scene framed by an arch of roses growing from urns.  Narrow double-edge sawtooth band at outer edges to frame the entire scene.  Signed: "LOYZO MARYA JUAPUYNA LACUNZA."  (Made by Maria Juapuyna Lacunza)
name: Sampler
